tooltip.relics.umbrella.description: Softens the fall, ensuring a safe landing from any height. With skillful use, it can serve as a reliable shield, keeping enemies at bay.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.ability.glider.d: When holding the umbrella in hand, it gradually slows the player's fall and reduces damage based on the falling speed. The slower the fall, the greater the damage reduction, up to complete negation.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.ability.shield.d: When used, it acts as a shield, knocking back targets.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.desc: Speeds up the drinking process, helping to not only quickly quench thirst but also surprisingly restore hunger.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.abil: When consuming a liquid, it also restores the player's hunger.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.desc: Speeds up the drinking process, helping to not only quickly quench thirst but also surprisingly restore hunger.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.abil: When consuming a liquid, it also restores the player's hunger.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.description: Allows for longer underwater exploration without the risk of drowning.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.ability.diving.de: Applies a temporary water breathing effect when fully submerged.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.description: Reduces prices when trading with villagers, making trades more profitable.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.ability.disc: Increases the discount when trading with villagers.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.descrip: Increases loot drops from killed mobs.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.ability: Has a chance to apply an additional level of looting to killed mobs. If successful, the ability triggers again, adding another level of looting. The process continues until the chance fails, summing all the levels.
tooltip.relics.anglers_hat.ability.catch: Has a chance to increase the amount of catch received. If successful, the ability triggers again, adding even more catch. The process continues until the chance fails, summing all the catch.
tooltip.relics.lucky_scarf.description: Increases the luck level when mining blocks.
Has a chance to apply an additional level of luck to mined blocks. If successful, the ability triggers again, adding another level of luck. The process continues until the chance fails, summing all the levels.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.des: Makes the player invisible to others when moving cautiously.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.abi: If the player's movement speed falls below a threshold, they gain an invisibility effect. Interacting with objects in the world creates an area where invisibility no longer applies until the player exits the area.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.description: Incinerates anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.ability.fir: Has a chance to ignite the target that attacked the player.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.description: Strikes anyone with lightning who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.ability.lig: Has a chance to strike the target that attacked the player with lightning.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.description: Poisons anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.ability.poi: Has a chance to reflect part of the damage and apply poison to the target that attacked the player.
